name: Rune Dungeon
description:
Rune Dungeon

The book of runes has been stolen... Can you do what it takes to get it back and save the world?

Utilize a simple, but unique spell creation system to annihilate your enemies!

You and your enemies play off the same set of runes, so be careful, your move could be your downfall!

Features:
  • Over 10 Unique Spells
  • Over 10 Monster types each with their own Special Attacks and Intelligence!
  • 28 Levels of Thrilling Fantasy Action
  • A Captivating Story
  • Over 30 Unique pieces of Armor
  • Over 10 Different Environments


~ Burnt Games ~
